title: Vivid Dreams: A Nightmares Story
description: THIS IS A SHORT STORY. THE FIRST IN A MINI-SERIES.As a small town waitress, Kristi's life is boring and dull until she starts have nightmares that terrify her. Will she be able to survive her vivid dreams once they start to become reality?Amazon: http://www.amazon.com/Vivid-Dreams-Ni...Print: https://www.createspace.com/4551452
author: A. McConnell
